import React from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/star_dull_icon.png' import star_icon from '../Assets/star_icon.png' import { ShopContext} from '../../Context/ShopContext' const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props; const {addToCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

{product.name}

122

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}
Juoiantang long cardigan made from soft, thick chunky knit with trendy shawl, c ollar design. Open shape, with hood, 2 patch pockets and long sleeves.

Tags : Modern, Latest

) } export default ProductDisplay
